thumb.title: Like a sepia-tinted old photograph オリジナル曲
thumb.description: ＃オリジナル曲 ＃ロック ＃ROCK ＃Logic Pro Like a sepia-tinted old photographMemories are fading into the distance.With the sense of loss that remains in my heartThe days just flow byWhat went wrong (between us)?I don’t know I don’t know The reason for your smileI don't know I don't knowClouds cover the cold night Sometimes kindness can betrayThe words we pass each other hurtThe tangled threads cannot be undoneLife doesn't always work out wellI don’t know I don’t know Even the place I go home toI don’t know I don’t know I don't know what I want to doI don’t know I don’t knowI can't tell what's realI don’t know I don’t knowThe clock hasn't moved since that dayother wayWhy notLost on timeNot foundThe sound of the bell rings outThe scene from that day comes back to me.In the pure white snowYou are not there anymore.I don’t knowkeep wandering around my heartI don’t know I don’t know Melting along with the snowI don’t know I don’t knowI walk down a road without youI don’t know I don’t knowThe city lights shine gently.
